SELECT u.*,o.org_name, co.company, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT r.id) as role_id, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT r.role_name) as role_name, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT application) as application , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT rc_channel.cfg_val1) as channel_id, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT rc_store.cfg_val1) as store_id
FROM com_user u LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, org_name FROM com_organization WHERE active =1) o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, company FROM synship.ct_company WHERE active =1) co ON co.id = u.company_id LEFT JOIN com_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN com_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id AND r.active = 1 LEFT JOIN view_role_application ap ON ap.id = r.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT role_id, cfg_val1 FROM com_role_config rc LEFT JOIN synship.tm_order_channel ch ON ch.order_channel_id = rc.cfg_val1 AND ch.active = 1 WHERE rc.cfg_name = 'channel_id') rc_channel ON rc_channel.role_id =r.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT role_id, cfg_val1 FROM com_role_config rc LEFT JOIN synship.wms_mt_store st ON st.store_id = rc.cfg_val1 AND st.active = 1 WHERE rc.cfg_name = 'store_id') rc_store ON rc_store.role_id =r.id
GROUP BY u.id
